Description:
Detects suspicious SQL query keywrods that are often used during recon, exfiltration or destructive activities. Such as dropping tables and selecting wildcard fields

Author: @juju4
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious SQL Query
Query: eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%drop%' or log like '%truncate%' or log like '%dump%' or log like '%select \*%')
